title: SATCOM Portable Terminal
explain: SATCOM portable terminal supports multiple types of satellite communication service and high transmission rate, as well as supports Beidou B1/B3 navigation function. It adopts intelligent operation system and equipped with touch screen and keyboard, and three-proof design is adopted to satisfy the operation in atrocious environment.
form:
Main Specifications
Operation networksatellite mobile communication
Servicevoice, data (1.2~384kbps）, FAX and short message
Navigation positioningBeidou/GPS, positioning accuracy 10m/4m
Operational temperature-20℃~55℃
Power supplyDC 14.4V（battery），AC 220V（power supply adapter）
